actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the erection of a statue to commemorate the founding of the Marine Barracks, Washington, D.C. by President Thomas Jefferson.

summary.text: Authorizes the erection of a statue of President Thomas Jefferson in company with Lieutenant Colonel William Ward Burrows, to commemorate the founding of the Marine Barracks, Washington, District of Columbia, the oldest post of the United States Marine Corps.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the erection of a statue to commemorate the founding of the Marine Barracks, Washington, D.C. by President Thomas Jefferson.
